content:
Hi all, posted the first round of items for a block vote: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/Block+Vote+1 . Note that each issue should have a comment with a link to the commit and draft PR in github to see the changes. If anything should pulled for more changes / discussion, please let me know. Thanks!

@Jenni Syed @Isaac Vetter @Bas van den Heuvel @Eric Haas @Spencer LaGesse @Weiyu Zhang

Jira project doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.

This is what I see when I am signed in and follow the link above :/

Gino, make sure you've shared your filter. And actually, please paste the list of items. While pasting a filter is nice, it's not sufficient for a vote record because filters can change (and what they evaluate to include can also change)
Blah, copied the filter and forgot to share it. Thanks, fixed! (@Josh Mandel )
Thanks!
I'm playing with Jira's "Export" options for inclusion of a snapshot here. There's no good "markdown for zulip" export ;-)
If it's preferred to list them here, it's probably easier for me to pull my working list over instead of that one.
[Jira Query -> PDF Export -> Copy]... was... OK
Or that :surprise:

Block Vote Items

  • FHIR-31465 Technical Correction Triaged Unresolved Typo - spelling Weiyu Zhang 2021-03-08 04:18
  • FHIR-31464 Technical Correction Triaged Unresolved Typo - misspelling Weiyu Zhang 2021-03-08 04:18
  • FHIR-31461 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Confusing phrase regarding rest-hook Spencer LaGesse 2021-03-08 04:18
  • FHIR-31455 Change Request Triaged Unresolved consider allow-list Isaac Vetter 2021-03-08 04:18
  • FHIR-31453 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Client ids aren'tsecrets. Isaac Vetter 2021-03-08 04:17
  • FHIR-31450 Change Request Triaged Unresolved white-listed vs allowlisted Isaac Vetter 2021-03-08 04:17
  • FHIR-31444 Change Request Triaged Unresolved nitpick! Isaac Vetter 2021-03-08 04:17
  • FHIR-31441 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Wrong element definition on "Additional Criteria" Bas van den Heuvel 2021-03-08 04:17
  • FHIR-31438 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Websocket message format unclear Bas van den Heuvel 2021-03-08 04:17
  • FHIR-31436 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Missing event specifications Bas van den Heuvel 2021-03-08 04:17
  • FHIR-31433 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Operation url uppercase Bas van den Heuvel 2021-03-08 04:17
  • FHIR-31432 Technical Correction Triaged Unresolved $$operation names Bas van den Heuvel 2021-03-08 04:17
  • FHIR-30387 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Typo on $status operation Jenni Syed 2021-01-14 09:31
  • FHIR-30385 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Need to backport $getws-binding operation Jenni Syed 2021-01-14 09:27
  • FHIR-30384 Change Request Triaged Unresolved The boundaries between FHIRCast and subscriptions should be put in the backport Jenni Syed 2021-01-14 09:19
  • FHIR-30374 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Subscription.notificatio nUrlLocation should document default behavior Jenni Syed 2021-01-14 08:32
  • FHIR-30367 Change Request Triaged Unresolved $status operation should be marked as Idempotent (to support GET) Jenni Syed 2021-01-14 07:29
  • FHIR-30365 Change Request Triaged Unresolved $status operation should be allowed on the Subscription/id path as well Jenni Syed 2021-01-14 06:29
  • FHIR-30174 Change Request Triaged Unresolved Remove the Support menu item Eric Haas 2020-12-30 06:00
  • FHIR-30172 Change Request Triaged Unresolved put workflow before channels section Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:57
  • FHIR-30171 Change Request Triaged Unresolved removing confusing text Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:56
  • FHIR-30168 Change Request Triaged Unresolved content-type: need to link to definition Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:47
  • FHIR-30167 Change Request Triaged Unresolved combine bullets Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:45
  • FHIR-30165 Change Request Triaged Unresolved indicates in text that these interations can repeat through the lifetime of S Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:41
  • FHIR-30164 Change Request Triaged Unresolved change to ...is shown below Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:38
  • FHIR-30162 Change Request Triaged Unresolved rearrange text for clarity Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:35
  • FHIR-30159 Change Request Triaged Unresolved move text into bullet Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:20
  • FHIR-30156 Change Request Triaged Unresolved describe server as publisher Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:03
  • FHIR-30155 Change Request Triaged Unresolved change overwhelmingly positive statement Eric Haas 2020-12-30 05:00
Oooh. Fancy :smile:
(Anyone who wants to be fancy like me can choose "View source" or hit e on the message to see how it works. H/T to Gino for the suggestion ;-))
I do 1)export 2) regex + replace to markdown 3)post to Zulip, @lloyd can we do regex downloady thing in JIra to get markdown ready file in single button in Jira?
I guess could go the pandoc route too

Having a handy "export block vote" function is on the list of "to do" features for managers. (Along with an 'apply block vote' option that'll copy the vote and date across all issues part of a block and perform the appropriate transitions on them - and holler if any aren't eligible to transition.). Don't have a specific estimate on when it'll be available.
@Gino Canessa Is this for conference call on Mar 22nd? or 29th?

Yunwei Wang said:

Gino Canessa Is this for conference call on Mar 22nd? or 29th?

@Yunwei Wang , I'd like to have it on the 22nd if possible - that will be a full week from the announcement.

hey @Gino Canessa for a block vote you need to provide a:
1) resolution
2) resolution description ( ..and I don't think it is sufficient to just point to a PR )
and technical corrections can be auto-approved without a vote!

Ok. Updating now.
Also, pulling FHIR#31438 since I haven't heard back from Bas.
